chapter.para: Administration > Configuration > Functional > Parameter Component > Parameter Component Lookup > Parameter Component

The Parameter Component document defines valid components that can be associated with a parameter. Parameter components indicate a general or specific piece of KFS functionality to which a parameter applies. Some Parameter Components are generic (batch, lookup, all) while others are very specific and refer to particular documents or even specific tabs or fields on documents.
Only members of the KR-SYS Technical Administrator or KFS-SYS Manager role can create or edit Parameter Component documents.

sect1.title: Document Layout
sect1.para: The Parameter Component document includes the Edit Parameter Detail Type tab.

table.caption: Edit Parameter Detail Type tab definition

tr.td: Required. Select the appropriate Namespace code for the parameter from the Namespace Code list or search for it from the lookup.
Required. Enter the parameter component code or search for it from the Parameter Component lookup.
Required. Enter the descriptive name of the parameter component being defined.
Required. Leave checked to indicate that this parameter component is active and can be associated with parameters. Uncheck the box to inactivate this component and make it an invalid choice.
